pastEvents.title: NMC: T-shirt Contest
pastEvents.description:
We've got another t-shirt contest! Make something cool and if it wins have it printed on t-shirts and sold! 

This contest is being sponsored by Imgix and they have chosen a fun prompt for us!

pastEvents.title: Spring Portfolio Review
pastEvents.description:
*this event is for EVERYONE - freshman, sophomore, junior and senior.

Get all of that amazing work you all do and come to spring portfolio review! 

We are hosting another portfolio review night with alumni and more for you to practice presenting your work just in time for Creative Industry Day.

pastEvents.title: Everything Will Be Okay
pastEvents.description: Graphic Design Professor, Mitch Goldstein is having an open, uncensored, and honest fireside chat for design students about design school, getting a job, self-care, and keeping your shit together during school and after you graduate.

pastEvents.title: Design Overlap
pastEvents.description:
A Thought At Work Event
An interdisciplinary design skillshare meant to break students out of their individual disciplines of design. RIT‚Äôs design clubs and organizations will be giving workshops on their skills followed by a reception.

pastEvents.title: Movie Work Party

pastEvents.title: Design for Inclusivity‚ÄîHow to get started and why
pastEvents.description: Inclusive Design is about considering the full range of human diversity to design with and for EVERYONE. Through activities, participants will learn the principles of Inclusive Design, what it is, why it matters, and, how to start applying the fundamentals to their work.

pastEvents.title: A Designer's Guide to Crafting Presentations
pastEvents.description: Presenting your design work to a company / an interviewer / another human being is not a simple task. We know that it's a struggle to find a starting point and figure out what to say, all the while dealing with nerves ‚Äì we've been there too!

pastEvents.title: Whiteboarding 101
pastEvents.description: While applying for a product, interaction, or UX design internships/jobs, you might be asked to perform a whiteboarding challenge.

pastEvents.title: Fall Portfolio Review
pastEvents.description: We are hosting a Fall portfolio review night. This event is an opportunity for you to practice presenting your work, get feedback on your project, learn about real world design roles and just connect with your alumni.
